title: Who is Viktor Bout and why might the US trade him for Brittney Griner
itunes:title: Who is Viktor Bout and why might the US trade him for Brittney Griner
description:
James, Gare, and Shereen talk about the “merchant of death,” prisoner swaps, the international arms trade, and Bout’s weird home videos.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
